responsibilities: Lead development of cross-platform applications, ensuring seamless performance across mobile and web platforms.
Manage customization and maintenance of client websites to improve user experience and engagement.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement interactive features, while optimizing application performance.
Conduct and oversee code reviews, ensuring adherence to best practices and improving overall code quality.
Assisted in the development of cross-platform applications, contributing to mobile and web functionality.
Supported website customization and maintenance, enhancing responsive design and usability.
Collaborated with senior developers to implement interactive features and troubleshoot performance issues.
Participated in code reviews and debugging, gaining hands-on experience in improving software quality.
Developed and deployed custom websites for small businesses and individuals, focusing on responsive design and usability.
Worked with clients to gather requirements, create wireframes, and deliver tailored digital solutions.
Built modern web applications using React, Next.js, and WordPress.
Managed hosting, deployment, and ongoing maintenance to ensure reliable performance.

details: Focused on Natural Sciences with advanced coursework in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry. Gained a solid foundation in analytical thinking and problem solving.
Learned front-end development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, WordPress, React.js. Built several small projects to strengthen coding and design skills.
Studied backend development using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB. Created REST APIs and learned database design fundamentals.
Pursuing a degree in Computer Science and Applied IT. Deepening knowledge in algorithms, software engineering, and full-stack development.
